definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Objective To explore the best way to clean endoscopic biopsy forceps.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討清洗軟式內鏡活檢鉗的最佳方法。

sentences.english: Skin biopsy withnerve inflammation is considered diagnostic.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚活檢與神經的炎症往往具有診斷意義。

sentences.english: HE and Gomori, Methenamine Silver (GMS) were used for tissue staining.
sentences.chinese: 對皮膚活檢組織行HE及六胺銀染色。

sentences.english: Liver biopsies were evaluated for steatosisper Kleiner.
sentences.chinese: 每克萊納脂肪變性，肝活檢評估。
組織活檢可能需要多個樣本。

sentences.english: Pathological exam of lip area tissue supported the diagnosis of Sj, gren s syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 脣腺活檢病理診斷符合乾燥綜合徵。

sentences.english: The exact relationship between the cerebral arteriopathy and ultra-structural changes in the skin biopsy is unknown.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚活檢的血管變化與腦動脈病的關係尚不明。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the nursing care of hair-loss patients for scalps biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討脫髮患者頭皮組織活檢術的護理。

sentences.english: Skin biopsy revealed that papule contained cornoid lamellae on the top of the raised border.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚活檢顯示丘疹的邊緣隆起處有角化不全雞眼樣板。

sentences.english: Bone marrow trephine biopsy as well as smear for cytological examination were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 骨髓穿刺活檢同時作骨髓塗片檢查。

sentences.english: Demyelination and axonal degeneration were confirmed electromicroscopicaly through sural nerve biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 神經活檢證實同時有脫髓鞘和軸索變性。

sentences.english: However, biopsy findings were compatible with gluten-sensitive enteropathy in all seven patients.
sentences.chinese: 而活檢則發現全部7名患者都符合麥麩敏感性腸病。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathological diagnosis of enteroscope biopsy on large intestine adenoma canceration.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大腸腺瘤癌變腸鏡活檢的病理診斷。

sentences.english: Testicular biopsies could offer voluble help for diagnosis and treatment of azoospermia.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸活檢對無精症的診治具有重要的指導意義。

sentences.english: Exercise tolerance dose of serum lactic acid and muscle biopsy are important for diagnose of MELAS syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 確診需要乳酸運動耐量試驗及肌肉活檢。

sentences.english: Results Of the 31 patients, tumor recurrence occurred in 14 on cystoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 結果31例經膀胱鏡檢查及活檢證實腫瘤復發14例。

pinyin: dian4 nao3 duan4 ceng2 sao3 miao2
